page.title: 07MY HOBBY; SCOUTING.
page.content: Scouts are a group of boys who do a variety of activities such as tieing knots, lashing and making things for use in emergencies, just for fun or for camp. Going to camp is my favourite activity. We usually go for a weekend, but sometimes we go for as long as a week. At camp we sleep in tents which are made out of canvas and can be large enough to fit ten people or small enough to fit one. At camp we cook on fires which we light with a match! (In the olden days they used to rub two sticks together to get a spark - which is virtually impossible!) Whilst at camp we do long hikes, usually walking about 12Km or more. We also do canoeing and rock climbing. I am a patrol leader. I have an assistant patrol leader and six other Scouts in my patrol.
